name: The Sidekick
description:
This is a game for the Bored Pixels Jam 8, everything in it has been created within a week.

Introduction

You are not the hero of this game... you are merely the assistant of the hero. Be sure to be a good assistant because, the hero is kinda cranky.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Dash - Spacebar

Interact/Advance Dialogue - E

Use Item - Click on item slot
